name: Car Destruction
description:
No matter you like fighting games which have thrilling experience on attack or just want to find something to give vent to your anger, "Car Destruuction" will be your good option!
Start your series of combos and smash the car in front of you within shortest time.
As you go through more levels, cars will be more and more difficult to smash. At this time, only upgrade your attack constantly and buy more powerful weapons can you deal with all kinds of new challenges.

Features
1. Thrilling attack experience. Changable moves combo.
2. Wanted Mode. Experience more difficult levels to get more rewards.
3. Saw, axe, stone hammer....There is always one weapon fiting to you.
4. Variety of powerful buffs help you become Kungfu Master.
